title: SHAP summary plot does not shows contribution of features for each classes of binary class.
body:
I tried to make "plot_type = bar" summary plot for multi-class classification. For this, it worked. However, the summary plot (bar type) does not show the contribution for each class for binary class. What can be the reason? 

This is the plot for binary class. (please click the image, to see it in detail).
![stupid](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60316900/124371712-25b07280-dca4-11eb-837f-f1e88b5ebfa8.png)

This is the kind of plot I want in binary class (though it is for multi-class).
![download (2)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60316900/124371735-67411d80-dca4-11eb-8a09-3ede0129bec6.png)

I need plot similar to this. (contribution of each feature on each class). 
![Capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60316900/124372527-36fc7d80-dcaa-11eb-806c-ab168c83bd6d.PNG)


I would be grateful if anybody could assist me with it. 
Many thanks.
